page.title: 15Bells Fruit Farm
page.content: By Sara Layton The area of Bells Fruit Farm covers about 120 acres. The land has belonged to the Bell family since 1909,about 76 years.The house itself is 300 years old.17 years ago they decided to go into the Pick Your Own business.They were only the second farm in the whole country to do this.Before 1968 they grew cereal crops,vegetables and fruit, they also bred pigs and cattle.Now they grow mainly fruit,although they have got one large field for vegetables.They spend the whole year working;During July_August they plant the next summers seeds.During the rest of the year they are kept busy weeding and hoeing.They do not grow anything using green_ houses.
